transcript: To you it is and to me but not to your father Now look you can talk yourself blue in the face, but there's nobody and there's no graves. So where are you?

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: To you it is, and to me, but not to your father.  Now look, you can talk yourself  blue in the face, but there's no body, and there's no grave, so where are you?
